CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 4, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "New Departure - Something new was featured at the fashion show at Brown Chapel Church last Friday by the Senior Choir. Boys and girls donned the raiment of altar boys and nuns, respectively...Lower photo [Top photo], left to right: Bonnie Wylie, Ray and Fay Drake, Ray Stokes.  Rear row: Audrey LaMar, Hester Lewis, Sylvania Chadwick and Janet Williams.  Lealie Walton's orchestra and the Bradford Majorettes were also features. - Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Girls wearing nun habits, first row from left: Bonnie Wylie, Ray Drake, Fay Drake, Ray Stokes; rear: Audrey LaMar, Hester Lewis, Sylvania Chadwick, and Janet Williams, posed in Brown Chapel Church for fashion show
CatSubject_tab: Children--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Costumes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Pittsburgh, Pa)
